infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: FindSOS needs access to your camera to take photos and compare them with missing person/pet reports using AI.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: FindSOS needs access to your photo library to select photos for comparison with missing person/pet reports.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: FindSOS needs permission to save comparison photos to your library.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: FindSOS needs access to your microphone to record voice descriptions in emergency panic reports.

plugins.photosPermission: FindSOS needs access to your photos to compare images with missing person/pet reports using AI technology.
plugins.cameraPermission: FindSOS needs access to your camera to take photos for AI-powered comparison with missing person/pet reports.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow FindSOS to access your microphone for emergency voice reports.
plugins.speechRecognitionPermission: Allow FindSOS to securely recognize user speech.
